text: Hubaal Muslimiinta iyo Muslimooyinka, mu’miniinta iyo mu’minooyinka, adeecayaasha, iyo adeecooyinka, run sheegayaasha iyo run sheegooyinka, samir yeelayaasha iyo samiryeelatooyinka khushuucayaasha hoos isu dhiga iyo khushoocooyinka hoos isu dhiga, sadaqeystayaasha iyo wax sadaqeystooyinka, soomayaasha iyo soomooyinka iyo dhowrsanayaasha xafida xubnahooda gaarka ahi iyo dhowrsanooyinka, Alle xusayaasha in badan iyo (Alle) xusooyinkaba. Allaah wuxuu u diyaariyey dambi dhaaf iyo abaalgud aad u weyn
